text.description:
{Ankh of Life}

Increases Max Health of units in the hero's army by 10% and increases effectiveness of Animate Dead, Cure and Resurrection spells by 10%.
text.event: You venture into a pyramid to find a mummy lying next to the entrance. You notice an ankh in its hand. You grab it and walk away, before it comes back to life and curses you.
text.name: Ankh of Life
